website_summaries.verdict: The best way to add modern feel to a space. Practical and visually pleasing all in one, this console table is a great buy for a variety of spaces.
pros: Combination of glass and wood creates a sophisticated and modern look that adds visual interest to a room
Sturdy enough to be used as a computer desk
cons: Tempered glass sides can break or chip easily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its the cutest table ever its very sophisticated I use it as a vanity/ computer desk..
customer_reviews.author: Tannisha Joseph-skeet

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, stylish, inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: great quality, easy to put together, looks beautiful! See picture :) I used it as a sleek desk with height adjustable chairs to adjust for the higher height
customer_reviews.author: NewYorkCityNikki

customer_reviews.title: Affordable modern end table
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and sturdy for the price. If it were at a higher price, I wouldn't rate it the same but I believe for the money, it looks great and should hold up for a long time. Arrived clean and wasn't difficult to install. Should take two people technically to build it but I was able to do it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dorin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase, Solid Desk, Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This table has exceed my expectations. It is wonderfully sturdy and looks sleep and modern in my small studio apartment. I use it as a desk... primarily for writing from my laptop and sometimes general reading/writiing. It is necessary, in my opinion, to get an adjustable desk chair or stool as the table height is roughly 2 inches higher than normal desks. If paired well this desk looks more expensive than it is. A great buy, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I needed and looks great. Arrived on a Sunday, and was in good consition, not damaged at all. Quality is good too, looks a lot more expensive than it actually is. Highly recommend (if you like contemporary)!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadi

customer_reviews.title: It's quite nice: ) waiting on my chair so that I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit small for a full on computer desk, but way to small for a vanity, which I originally bought it for, so I made it my computer desk. It's quite nice :) waiting on my chair so that I can sit at it! I love the color, and the modern look of it
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, heavy glass legs.  A good sized piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Plate glass is heavy and the shiny plastic top and back piece arrived amazingly undamaged. The table is substantial - not a small piece. I love this console table! Note, in the picture, the front piece is the Monarch table and it is much larger than the other two console tables I purchased at the same time, back right, which are the "Euro Style Teresa Console Tables". These three console tables go well together as they are shiny and modern. The shelf in the back is the "Monarch Hollow Core/Chrome Metal Room Divider" which is a matt finish - not shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri O

customer_reviews.title: 2-Person Assembly, but SO WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is so high quality! I'm thinking about getting another to replace my vanity with. I use this as a computer desk and it's perfectly sized for my 13" laptop. It makes the space look so modern and crisp! The one downside is that it was difficult for my husband and I to put together, and he's usually amazing assembling furniture alone. It took us both about half an hour because of how heavy and awkward the pieces are.. so I'd say this is a two-person assembly job! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Max Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I found this table It was exactly what I was searching for. I had been to Ross, Pier One, and almost every other store I could imagine and anything similar to it was more expensive. The value for the money is outstanding. The assembly however, was ridiculously difficult. Need 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had some empty space in my live room and couldnt decide what to do with it. I want a table that would match my coffee table and this fit the bill. Super easy to assemble and very nice in person. It's a small table so don't expect something huge but for my space, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lewis

customer_reviews.title: and love it so when I saw the sofa table I ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, modern table! I have the coffee table that is the exact same style, the tempered glass as the legs on the short ends, and love it so when I saw the sofa table I knew I had to have it!! I have it in my front room to be used as a decor piece and to function as a desk when I'm working from home. (Side note: being a sofa table, it's taller than a desk would be so if you want to use it for that you should keep in mind non-adjustable desk chairs will be too low for this table). I love having this in my apartment!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey H.

customer_reviews.title: looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to put together but keep in mind the temper glass is a little on the heavier side. def would be better to have someone help set up. also be aware of which you screw in the bottom white panel. if the panel is going to lean on the wall or if its going to be exposed because the screw will show and will it look less costly. very versatile. currently using it as a table console by our front entrance but will use as a make up table when we move.
customer_reviews.author: madonna sikat

customer_reviews.title: Assembly sucks sooo much. But good table.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table, good packaging, no damage. This is NOT a one person assembly. It is heavy, and there's too many barely long enough screws requiring very precise balance with a hamper, 3-5 large textbooks, 2 plastic bin lids and 25,000 well placed curse words (sorry neighbors) to get the job done. Though that may just be me. Now that it is built though the table really does look good in the space.
customer_reviews.author: Nida

customer_reviews.title: better than IKEA/ Target/ Staples desks!
customer_reviews.text: this desk is super sturdy, beautiful and small - but not too small! It's meant to be a console table, but i'm using it as a small corner desk in my room and love it! It looks and feels luxurious and was super easy to assemble. It fits my laptop and other belongings perfectly. The directions were blah, but it's pretty straightforward. i would recommend this desk to anyone over using desks from other retailers! PS - sorry the picture is sideways... not sure why Amazon did me dirty like that!
customer_reviews.author: cassie u.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and classy!
customer_reviews.text: Classy and great quality, love the design the fact that the glass give a lot of elegant touch. Used it as a hallway console, it's sturdy and look beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Good deal hunter :)

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in a hallway. I was able to put this together myself but it was frustrating. It would probably be best to have two people. The glass holes and the table top don’t necessarily align correctly. So it took a lot of patience to put it together. Once assembled it looks very nice and fits the aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyse Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am totally in love with this table. It's a perfect setup for my vanity area. I had a small space to work with and this table fits just right in that space. I love the glossy white look and the glass legs. It's perfect! It's a very sturdy table too! I assembled this by myself and it took about 20 minutes to put together and about 5 minutes trying to figure out the directions lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to use as my vanity table. I love the quality and look of it. The glasses on the sides are super sturdy and the glossy tabletop is just so sleek and glam. I would’ve said this was a great deal for the price but I recently saw the same design for a lot less... not sure how the quality is though.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and looks very high end. I turned my closet in my guest room into a small office space for my guest. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The desk far exceeded my expectations. It is beautiful and looks very high end.
customer_reviews.author: Roeshell C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to purchase this desk. I purchased two to use in my office and everyone loves them. Not difficult to assemble after you process the initial disappointment regarding the instructions. Parts not heavy, but bulky. Two people recommended but not necessary if you are fairly handy and tenacious.
customer_reviews.author: WhyisthisNecessary

customer_reviews.title: wow great piece!!
customer_reviews.text: *this will eventually be used for my vanity, makeup corner, love this piece in my bedroom. 1. Fit- perfect fit for that corner. Measurements accurate. 2. installation: I put this together alone, less than an hour, super easy. 3. Sturdy; no wobbles at all, every piece in tact upon delivery. 4. Quality- looks and feels very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: cuecali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was super easy! I do reccomend having another person around to hold the pieces, it was a little more difficult figuring out how to do that alone, but still a breeze compared to other products. It's sleek and very well made. Looks like a desk that would be 3x or 4x the price. Would purchase again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Henson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my table! Looks nice in my entryway! It did have a small chip in the corner but I just put that side against the wall and it's not visible.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Was able to assemble it myself. Good quality and sturdy. Good value for the price. Shipping was a little slower since it wasn’t Prime.
customer_reviews.author: REYS5

customer_reviews.title: Looks very chic and sophisticated!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new desk! Fit easily where I needed it to, came nicely packaged and wrapped safe so glass didn't break. I use it in my living room to fill an awkward section of space between my fireplace and a wall. I am TERRIBLE at putting things together and even I could figure this one out. Looks so sleek and fancy!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Can you tell I am excited?
customer_reviews.text: I can not tell you how happy I am with this desk. I don’t know if it will last, but I am beyond excited. It is sleek and modern, but could fit in a traditional space. Love it! The seller delivered 5 days earlier than expected, which added to my excitement.
customer_reviews.author: yahoo15146

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with slight damage to one corner of the tabletop, but I didn't want to go through the hassle of a return. Other than that, it's exactly what I wanted: a modern console table to keep by my front door for keys and stuff. Nice height for me (I'm tall) and it's held up well to decent amounts of weight on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kolbe Moss

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, check before assembling
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, modern looking piece. Unfortunately I didn’t realize corner of table top was slightly damaged until after I assembled. Don’t have the energy or time to shop back and request new one, will just put something on top to cover it. Difficult to assemble solo as the parts need to all fit together pretty much at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Okay.. this thing was definitely somewhat difficult to put together by yourself (items are a bit heavy) but it was worth it! It's quite tall and is perfect for the space I needed to fit it in. I'm using it as a desk! Pretty sturdy. Worth the purchase! The different color options are awesome too. The table top measurements are exact so make sure you don't buy any big accessories cause chances are they wont fit.
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I find it to be well made. I love the look of the faux reclaimed wood. I don't think it looks cheap at all. I paid $113.00 on amazon I originally found two sites selling the table one site was $177.00 and another site was $168.00. I was thrilled to pay only $113.00. I thought it would be defective, only found one little chip in the glass that no one would ever notice.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and simple
customer_reviews.text: Fist,i have tk said the seller customer service are so nice.i recive my item with some missing bolts and they resolve my issue at the moment.i call and they answer really fast.they resolve my problem in minutes.now i have my beautiful desk that ill be using as a computer desk.im so in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Isacc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great table!!! Very sturdy and well made! I’m using it as a vanity as you can see. It’s BEAUTIFUL! Will be purchasing more! The instructions are very short and complex but I love putting things together so once I figured out the map it only took a few mins to assemble. You will need two people to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table!... i originally wanted the white one, but it was not in stock and I'm so glad i went for the this grey one. It looks alot prettier in person, and it doesnt clash withmy room decor... i use it as a my vanity to do my makeup and skin care in the mornings. It was not hard to assemble, but i could have used a second par of hands amd it would have taken me less time. Overall, i friken love this table.
customer_reviews.author: adriana cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This table far exceeded my expectations. It is very good quality and the assembly was relatively easy. Like the instructions indicate, you should have two people assembling this table due to the weight of certain pieces. Some pieces are very heavy and to hold that and attempt to insert the screw is extremely difficult! LOL! Overall a VERY nice quality table!
customer_reviews.author: AKL_HBG

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with table works great for a desk. Easy to put together. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Noslen

customer_reviews.title: Using as vanity table.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my niece who moved in with my parents. She loves it as her vanity. Very sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Garsaya

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, very modern looking. I put an acrylic lamp and a white orchid flower arrangements and I use it as a desk when I'm using my laptop. I think it's a little higher than a regular desk , so you might have to use a adjustable height office chair ( I have a white leather and chrome office chair to match it).
customer_reviews.author: maria q

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. This table can be decorated in many different ways. The table is no too small or not too big. It’s just the perfect size for an entrance way. The price not to mention is unbeatable for the elegant character it brings to your home. Fit for a house or apartment. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: M.Perry

customer_reviews.title: Table is beautiful. All our friends are all commenting on it
customer_reviews.text: Table is beautiful. All our friends are all commenting on it. It was easy to assemble, especially if you follow the suggestion another reviewer posted for one-person assembly, lay it on it's side. The sales rep was fabulous when the local freight company continually screwed up delivery for 3 days in a row, she not only called them repeatedly but texted also texted and called me repeatedly. Her efforts definitely rate 6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Modern for my Home Office
customer_reviews.text: The shiny white top and thick glass sides are super modern in my home office. Now I can move my piles of work to this side table to keep my desk clean. This was easy to put together and solid with no wobble. Very modern and simple design which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I live the slender look. It fits great in my room since my other roomis being occupied right now. Love the see through glass side and the smooth shiny finish on the top. My Hollywood mirror fits perfectly on top. The price was amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Pandemic Savior
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk to use during the stay at home order. Since I didn’t have a desk at home, I wanted something that will still function when I go back to work. I read the reviews and noticed that someone was using this table as a desk and paired it with an acrylic chair also purchased on Amazon. It looks great and serves the purpose that I need it to at the moment. Very happy with the outcome!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Takes up no visual floor space
customer_reviews.text: Great for small areas. Co temporary. Beautiful. Looms like a floating shelf. And took me 15 min to put together by myself. I'm very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: A great addition ...
customer_reviews.text: Decorating a new place can take time - finding great pieces at great prices! With that being said, I needed a sofa table or something along those lines to place against the wall directly across from my bed. After months of searching I finally took the chance and ordered this table. Glad I did! It is worth it's price, and easy to assemble! It looks far more expensive than it is with a good mixture of pieces (glass and solid pieces), adding variety to the room. Overall, a great addition to the bedroom. ASSEMBLY: Easy to moderate. Will need a helping hand to hold pieces together while another screws. PRICE: Good value! STYLE: Modern, sleek,
customer_reviews.author: Senait Taddese

customer_reviews.title: ITS THE PERFECT CONSOLE TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this console. It’s the perfect size, it’s sturdy and it’s modern. I assembled it by myself. It does not take two people to put it together. Follow the steps. Remember it’s a console table.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After more than 3 yrs of using it, we still 🧡 it. Very good value for the money. It was under $90 back then. In fact, we liked it so much, we just purchased the nesting tables from the same series.
customer_reviews.author: SleepyInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive be mindful of sharp corners
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Was easy to set up but requires 2 people for sure! It's heavy and seems durable. Corners are sharp so be mindful of that. Don't forget to put the plastic bottoms on after assembly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: The glass is thick and good quality. the laminate glossy white finish is smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: For $100, I wasn't really expecting much. But, when I received the table, I was pleasantly surprised! The glass is thick and good quality. the laminate glossy white finish is smooth and feels nice. My only complaint is that the support beam bolts are not capped like the ones for the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this gorgeous piece. Use it as a desk/vanity. Works great in my small space.
customer_reviews.author: JAc

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! I love it! Had it for about a year now
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This table is absolutely beautiful. The style makes the room appear larger. It is stunning and very well made. The product was packaged perfectly and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Iowa mom

customer_reviews.title: Expensive looking table
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand stands alone in class and beauty. I purchased this table hoping it would match my flooring and it did perfectly. The distressed wood look mixed with the glass stands and metal accents really set this table apart from the rest.
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! It's a quality piece...the glass and wood are both heavy and substantial, not flimsy at all. The height is perfect for behind the sofa. I read other reviews about instructions but for me the picture with screws was enough, took me about 15min to assemble alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Im in love with this vanity
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this vanity, It is sturdy, heavy and the glass was thick. I was happy it was tall because I purchased a chair that need to fit under it and it was perfect, I use it in my bedroom as a makeup vanity and it beautiful and I get a lot of compliments on it. I will purchase again for other rooms in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, it looks perfect in my living room, it was easy to ensamble my sister and my friend did it for me, I tough it will requiere a man help but it turns out we didn't, it's pretty simple but I suggest to do it with someone else's help cause the table gets a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kateri Baez

customer_reviews.title: Can serve many uses (soda, entry or dressing table)
customer_reviews.text: My tween daughters room is very small, so I liked the idea of the glass sides. It doesn’t have drawers, but plenty of room next to the stool to add a caddy. It wasn’t too hard to put together. It’s helpful to have two people, as the glass is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: samIam

customer_reviews.title: Class look..affordable high class look
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing..the cheapest console you can buy that looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: jorge subculture

customer_reviews.title: Office Desk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this desk for my office and I absolutely love it the delivery was very quick and the assembly only took about 20-30 mins
customer_reviews.author: Nya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, modern, affordable desk
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect fit for my daughters’ bedroom! Not too bulky, modern, easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christy K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: It seems like mostly good quality but the glass is chipped around one of the holes. It looks like it will be easy to assemble but it's really heavy so I'll probably need a second person to help.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Desk
customer_reviews.text: I got this sleek, modern desk for just $87, and it was so worth it. It's minimal and space saving (width of desk is smaller than most). I love it. The only complaint I have was that it was kind of a pain putting together, but with two people it only took about 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ainea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love our new glass table using it as a desk for my daughter. Great price and very sturdy. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Looks very modern and compliments my furniture. Easy to assemble and looks like it was purchased at store that sells expensive furniture costing ten times more. I plan on purchasing the other matching pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Music Mike

customer_reviews.title: post covid- WFH solution
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect for my bedroom office set up. highly recommend. excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my vanity! Very sturdy, great price, and looks great! The clear sides helps keep the space from looking cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. I assembled this myself and I'm a woman, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Quality was not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Quality was not that good. Both of the two pieces of Part 4... which is the plastic cover for glass bottom came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The value for the price is good.
customer_reviews.text: I use as a Vanity for small space room that have. I really love it but it came with a little damage in one corner, I wait long long time for it so I won’t return it for that because will take more time. Other then that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table. It’s beautiful and looks expensive. It was east to assembled, I put it together myself.

customer_reviews.title: Really really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with table. It's very pretty. Outstanding price.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So gorgeous and classic; really easy to assemble as well
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Compliments keep coming !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Monarch I purchase to furnish my new apartment. I’ve had so many compliments Love it!!! What else can I say
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I have used it yet, but the look of it is simple and elegant and I can not wait to add it to my room and see the finish look!
customer_reviews.author: Lateia G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble! Id say it took me about 20 mins alone. Looks amazing and classy!!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL! I find that purchasing furniture on Amazon can ...
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL! I find that purchasing furniture on Amazon can be hit or miss, but this was exactly what I was looking for! We use it as an entryway table. Dimensions listed are accurate, it is very heavy (which made it a little harder to put together), which made for a very sturdy table. Packaged excessively well, arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Modern, contemporary, affordable, nice looking, easy to put up, quite acceptable quality per the price point. An occasional usage credenza! You are not paying an arm and a leg, hence don't expect an "uber alles" masterpiece of a table...
customer_reviews.author: Yojyck

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: The assembly has some tricky parts and would be hard to do with one person but it looks exactly as pictured and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this table!!! I’ve made it a make up table. It was a little challenging at first to assemble alone but once I got the first side in, it was smooth sailing. I would recommend 2 people assembling
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Console Table
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend put this table together for me. It was easy, but the glass sides are very heavy. The table, when assembled, looks very nice. It takes up little visual space when space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: Peach C.

customer_reviews.title: Nicer looking in person
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table, it looks so much prettier in person and it is a lot heavier and sturdier then I thought... definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty console! I use it as my vanity
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty console! I use it as my vanity. A little tall but I’m 5’1 and can still sit at it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alice J.

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Its very modern and goes well with the rest of my furniture. I did notice when I got the table however that the edges of the laminate were a bit bubbly but once I finished putting it together it became less obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Urabe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Easy to build!
customer_reviews.text: Classy & Modern Desk! I love it. Don’t hesitate, BUY NOW!!!

customer_reviews.text: Nice and modern console table. Perfect for my small apartment space. I liked the glossy finish it’s easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble ✨
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble My 16 and 14 years old brothers did it in less than 1 hour. I use it as a desk So if you are looking for something classic and easy to assemble that’s the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Marsmine Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Its gorgeous, modern and chic!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table!! It's stunning in person and is very sturdy. It's the perfect size as a addition to my living room. Don't hesitate, buy it!! Delivery was also ahead of time with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: GlamourGirl@❤

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Console
customer_reviews.text: I did it all by myself and it was easy. Assembled it upside down and finished in 20mins. This piece is a high quality console. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: LEVEL UP!
customer_reviews.text: So RIGHT! Really HIGH END look. Perfect to level up on style in any area.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. It’s kinda a pain to get glass ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. It’s kinda a pain to get glass bolt and all the washers connected the bolts should b a little longer

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece!!! My daughter loved it & super easy to assemble! Looks super bougie

customer_reviews.text: Nice as described, Though it was wider than I thought

customer_reviews.title: This table works for everything!
customer_reviews.text: This table has a million uses and is perfect for small apartments! I recommend this table for literally everything.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Skelton

customer_reviews.title: A gem to find on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It looks so good in my room and the glossy finish is beautiful! One of my favorite finds on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It look sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Damn I like this table a lot so pretty n modern in person.. look minimal and match my hardwood floor My TV is 55” and it fit almost perfectly plus it feel sturdy enough... hopefully I won’t break while my heavy tv was on there

customer_reviews.text: love this ...clean lines and not too wide..just right for my tv in my bedroom
customer_reviews.author: oklahoma, for me!!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I've just built this, along with the nesting tables, and so far it's quite lovely. Easy to put together (the small bolts go with the small piece of wood, the large ones with the top). I'll update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these consoles. The table's are very nice looking and are sturdy. Unfortunately, both tables came damaged as well as the plastic parts for the glass legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Simonian

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the Instructions !
customer_reviews.text: The directions of assembly were opposite of what was stated. Took forever to put together. You would think by looking at it you could put it together quickly. Definitely cannot be put together by one person.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I regret spending so much on this table, it's not even wood more like some kind of plastic coating. This is completely over priced, you pay for the glass that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Rate it Jane

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. We get so many compliments about this table at our beach house. Had to get one for our home as well!! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: IHM

product_meta.title: Monarch specialties , Console Sofa Table, Tempered Glass, Dark Taupe, 44"L
product_meta.description: Color:Dark TaupeTo have or not to have just isn't an option! This glossy white finished accent table offers individuals a simple yet favorable way for placing drinks, snacks or meals while watching TV or chatting on the sofa. Its sturdy yet fashionable chrome metal base and a cappuccino finished top that provides exceptional support to this must-have piece.
feature_bullets: Warm dark taupe reclaimed wood-look finish with a 1.5 in. thick table top
Looks great as an accent in your hallway, entryway, or living room
Easy to maintain, simply wipe clean with a soft dry or slightly damp cloth
